item.title: Practical Local AI
item.description: Running Fara-7B Locally: Hardware, CUDA, VRAM, and Lessons Learned in 2026 Why This Exists I wanted to run Fara-7B, a computer-use + vision + long-context model, locally. The motivation was simple: experiment with agentic models without depending on cloud GPUs or paid APIs, and understand what “local computer use” currently requires in 2026.
